title: 2 Bedroom 2 Full Bath Condo for Rent
posting_body: ['Downstairs condo off of Craig Rd & Lamb Blvd.', 'Clean, roomy 2Bedroom, 2Full bathroom.', 'Master bedroom has its own bathroom.', 'This condo has new carpet & paint, new kitchen countertops & new bathroom sinks with vanities.', 'Unit comes with washer/dryer & fridge.', 'Living room has built in fireplace.', 'Unit also has a covered patio.', 'The complex is gated & security on property.', 'You will have your own covered parking space, a pool key & mailbox key.', 'Monthly rent is $1,400.00 due on the 1st of every month.', 'Requirements:', '* Verifiable income', "* 1st month's rent; Last month's rent; Security deposit", '* 6 months Lease', '*', 'No Pets', '* Minimum to move in $4,200']
